heading: Hadith.
general-note: Here are entered works on the oral traditions concerning the deeds and sayings of Muḥammad, the prophet, solely. Works on the oral traditions concerning the deeds and sayings of Imams and Muḥammad, the prophet, are entered under. Hadith (Shiites).. Works on the traditions of individual Imams are entered under the name of the Imam with subdivision. Hadith..
